entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is mentioned as someone who was being stalked by the narrator. She is described as 'sulking' and the narrator mentions that she didn't forget his body until her dying day.

entities.name: professor dippet
entities.description: Professor Dippet is mentioned as someone who asked the narrator to look for Myrtle. He is not described in detail.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who was listening to a song and thinking about it. He is not described in detail.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an institution where Myrtle went to stop the narrator from stalking her.

entities.name: toilet
entities.description: The toilet is mentioned as a location where the narrator had to live after being forced to come back by Myrtle.

entities.name: merpeople
entities.description: Merpeople are mentioned in a song that Harry was thinking about. They are described as taking something from him.

relationships.description: Professor Dippet asked Myrtle to look for the narrator.
Myrtle went to the Ministry of Magic to stop the narrator from stalking her.
The narrator was forced to live in his toilet by Myrtle.
Harry was thinking about the merpeople's song.
The narrator was stalking Myrtle, which led to her going to the Ministry of Magic and forcing him to live in his toilet.
